title: League of Legends won't Hide
body: I have started playing league at my workplace, and I got an external application called Clicky Gone. What it does is that hides the current application I am in with a combination of buttons. It works on all my other applications EXCEPT league. It even works for the client, just no the in game. Does anyone know a way to make it so the game will also hide when I click the correct button combination? Thank you

replies.body: Hmmmmm I'm not sure how that program works tbh. You may want to try searching their forums to see if anyone got it figured out though!

I don't think it is the client, but rather something with League of Legends. Whenever I would press Windows Key+D to bring me to my desktop in a match it also won't register, and I wind up using a summoner spell by accident.
